definition: a modal particle indicating (don't mind it, ok)
a modal particle indicating (that's all, only, nothing much)
to stop/to cease/to dismiss/to suspend/to quit/to finish
(completed action marker)/(modal particle indicating change of state, situation now)/(modal particle intensifying preceding clause)
to finish/to achieve/variant of 瞭|了[liao3]/to understand clearly

sentences.english: It's carrion! Who killed that man?
sentences.chinese: 不過是一具腐爛的屍體罷了，誰殺了這個人？

sentences.english: I think that a luxury is nothing but an indulgence to showoff one's wealth.
sentences.chinese: 我想奢侈品只是用來彰顯自己的財氣罷了。

sentences.english: We're all goin' the same way, just taking different roads to get there…
sentences.chinese: 我們都走向統一個方向，只是走的路不同罷了。

sentences.english: This handkerchief belonged to the old gentleman, who had simply let it fall from his pocket.
sentences.chinese: 這手帕原是那老先生的，偶然從他衣袋裏掉出來罷了。

sentences.english: Maybe it was just a false alarm.
sentences.chinese: 或許只是一場虛驚罷了。

sentences.english: Hitler's just a self-educated street agitator.
sentences.chinese: 希特勒無非是個自學出身的街頭煽動家罷了。

sentences.english: You are merely trying to be smart.
sentences.chinese: 你只是想耍耍小聰明罷了。

sentences.english: No, I was not mad, just slow to catch up with my life's 2)revisions.
sentences.chinese: 不，我沒瘋，只是沒跟上世道的變化罷了。

sentences.english: Who was talking about not liking you? You're just in pain.
sentences.chinese: 誰說你不討男人喜歡了？你不過是在痛苦罷了。

sentences.english: The US presence is just a recruiting poster for the Taliban.
sentences.chinese: 美國的存在也就不過是張塔利班招募新兵的海報罷了。

sentences.english: It could be just a memory that floats into your head for no reason.
sentences.chinese: 它可以只是一些無緣由的飄過腦海中的記憶罷了。

sentences.english: There is really no such thing as bad weather, only different kinds of good weather.
sentences.chinese: 世上實無惡劣天氣，只有好天氣的種種不同罷了。
這不過是弄亂你的頭髮罷了。

sentences.english: I think their last win was just a fluke .
sentences.chinese: 我認爲他們上次獲勝只是僥倖罷了。
監視哨只是些無聲的人影罷了。

definition: only/merely/nothing but/no more than/it's just that ...
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
